00035     class D3D9GpuProgram : public GpuProgram
00036     {
00037     protected:
00038         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 mpDevice;
00039         LPD3DXBUFFER mpExternalMicrocode; // microcode from elsewhere, we do NOT delete this ourselves
00040     public:
00041         D3D9GpuProgram(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00042             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader, LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDev);
00043         
00044 
00049         void setExternalMicrocode(LPD3DXBUFFER pMicrocode) { mpExternalMicrocode = pMicrocode; }
00051         LPD3DXBUFFER getExternalMicrocode(void) { return mpExternalMicrocode; }
00052     protected:
00054         void loadImpl(void);
00056         void loadFromSource(void);
00058         virtual void loadFromMicrocode(LPD3DXBUFFER microcode) = 0;
00059 
00060 
00061     };

00102     class _OgreExport D3D9GpuProgramPtr : public SharedPtr<D3D9GpuProgram> 
00103     {
00104     public:
00105         D3D9GpuProgramPtr() : SharedPtr<D3D9GpuProgram>() {}
00106         explicit D3D9GpuProgramPtr(D3D9GpuProgram* rep) : SharedPtr<D3D9GpuProgram>(rep) {}
00107         D3D9GpuProgramPtr(const D3D9GpuProgramPtr& r) : SharedPtr<D3D9GpuProgram>(r) {} 
00108         D3D9GpuProgramPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<D3D9GpuProgram>()
00109         {
00110             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00111             OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00112             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00113             pRep = static_cast<D3D9GpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00114             pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00115             if (pUseCount)
00116             {
00117                 ++(*pUseCount);
00118             }
00119         }
00120 
00122         D3D9GpuProgramPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00123         {
00124             if (pRep == static_cast<D3D9GpuProgram*>(r.getPointer()))
00125                 return *this;
00126             release();
00127             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00128             OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00129             OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00130             pRep = static_cast<D3D9GpuProgram*>(r.getPointer());
00131             pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00132             if (pUseCount)
00133             {
00134                 ++(*pUseCount);
00135             }
00136             return *this;
00137         }
00138     };
